headline: Wells Fargo upgrades Extra Space amid improving outlook for self-storage
summary: Investing.com -- Wells Fargo raised its rating on Extra Space Storage to Overweight from Equal Weight, saying the self-storage operator looks best positioned among peers as the sector shows signs of stabilizing after a weak start to the year.

content.title: Wells Fargo upgrades Extra Space amid improving outlook for self-storage
